features: Moisturized Curly Hair- Dream Lengths Curls Moisture Seal Conditioner detangles and seals curls with moisture for up to 72 hours when used with system. Say goodbye to greasy, frizzy curls. Best for wavy hair to curly hair
Curly Hair Care- Dream Lengths Curls paraben-free nourishing formulas help achieve hydrated, defined, bouncy, soft curly hair without the weigh down

Formulated for Curls- with hyaluronic acid and castor oil, Elvive Dream Lengths Curls regimen helps locks in long-lasting moisture for deeply hydrated curls from scalp to tip and defines curls by sculpting and retaining shape

Dreamy Curl Routine- Moisture Push Shampoo and Moisture Seal Conditioner hydrate, No-Build Up Micellar Shampoo removes build-up, Non-Stop Dreamy Curls leave-in conditioner defines and Refresh and Reshape Curl spray refreshes
Irresistible Fragrance- Dream Lengths Curls has a sweet candy fragrance with notes of pomegranate, caramel orchid and milk sorbet, making it indulgent
body.description: Elvive Dream Lengths Curls paraben-free nourishing formulas help achieve dreamy hydrated, defined, bouncy, soft curly hair without the weigh down. Formulated with a cocktail of hyaluronic acid and fine castor oil, Elvive Dream Lengths Curls curly hair regimen helps locks in long-lasting moisture for deeply hydrated curly hair from scalp to tip and defines curly hair by sculpting and retaining shape. Plus, helps fight humidity! Moisture Push Shampoo cleanses without stripping hair of moisture, while Moisture Seal Conditioner works in perfect synergy to help seamlessly detangle without breaking the definition of curly hair. No-Build Up Micellar Shampoo water-to-airy foam acts like a magnet to gently remove the most stubborn build-up. Non-Stop Dreamy Curls leave-in conditioner moisturizes and defines curly hair by day with a silk pillowcase effect by night. Refresh & Reshape leave-in spray instantly brings curly hair back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on curls!
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight conditioner that smells delicious and handles the frizz!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS LINE OF PRODUCTS!
reviews.reviewText: I admit I’ve used this line of LOreal products for many years. I use them because they work!As I’ve gotten older, and my hair has changed with the growth of grey taking over my hair, thus the thickness and texture of my hair…., these products are the only thing I’ve found that seems to be consistent in their ability to keep my hair growing ( less breakage), helping to control my hair now that the grey seems to make it more difficult to work with.It leave my hair more controllable, soft, and shiny.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED PRODUCT if you find your hair has a lot of breakage, or manageability is becoming difficult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite items for my hair. Works and smells amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hace todo lo que dice! Y mi pelo es mucho y muy rebelde pero logro conseguir lo que quiero

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner smells soooo good! I have really thick, curly Islander hair and it leaves my hair very soft and noticeably less frizzy. It is my new favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: Great conditioner for curly hair. Also you get a lot for a great price, so definitely worth your money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect on my curls 💞🫶Really recommend!!!!I would give 10 stars if I could👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Specs in Hair
reviews.reviewText: As others have mentioned, it left little specs in my daughter's hair that looked like dandruff. If you are vigilant, you can get them all rinsed out and by the time you brush, they are gone. But, we will not be buying this again.SIDENOTE: This product did keep my daughter's curly hair soft and wasn't bad with detangling. The price was also right, so if you can live with the points I noted earlier, you might give it a shot.
